Class ClientControllerInstance

java.lang.Object
Client.Controller.ClientControllerInstance

public class ClientControllerInstance extends Object implements ClientController
Implementation of the ClientController interface.

      public void loadLobbyInfo(String id, List<String> playerNames, Map<String,Color> playerColors, Map<String,Boolean> playerReady, Boolean isSavedGame)
      Description copied from interface: ClientController
      Loads the data needed while in the lobby. This is called by a LobbyPlayersMessage when the client connects successfully to a server
      Specified by:
      loadLobbyInfo in interface ClientController
      Parameters:
      id - the client id needed to reconnect to the game
      playerNames - a list of the names of the players in the game
      playerColors - a map of the players' names to their colors
      playerReady - a map of the players' names to their ready status
      isSavedGame - whether the game is a saved game or a new game

      Parameters:
